title: N.S. bans evictions while committing funds to Feed Nova Scotia, income assistance - Global News

content: The Nova Scotia government is making sure tenants impacted by the COVID outbreak cant be evicted while also committing million to food banks across the province The announcements were made a press briefing in Halifax on Thursday which was held virtu chars
